'''''Amon Hen'' 230''' is the two-hundred-and-thirtieth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[July]] [[2011]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen230.jpg|Seat of Seeing]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Additional Decorative Artwork
** By: Steve Lines
* Announcements
* [[International Tolkien Fellowship|International]] Upcoming Events
** By: Susan Frances Edwards
* Subscriptions Announcement
* [[Oxonmoot 2011|Oxonmoot]] Announcement
* Further along the road... - [[The Return of the Ring|2012 news]]
** By: [[Patricia Reynolds|Pat Reynolds]]
* Artwork: ''Untitled ([[Gollum]])''
** By: Chris Bell
* Report: [[Unquendor]] Lustrum 2011
* By: Jessica Yates
* The [[Oliphaunt (disambiguation)|Oliphaunt]] in the [[Rivendell|Last Homely House]]
** By: [[Alex Lewis]]
* Response to Review of [[Mirkwood: A Novel About JRR Tolkien|Mirkwood: A Novel]]
** By: Steve Hillard
* Hall of Fire
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Madeline Flint
* An Unusual Reading of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
** By: David Doerr
* The Lunacy of ''[[The Hobbit]]''
** By: [[Kristine Larsen]]
* Poem: ''The Orc's Lament''
** By: Sue Wookey
* Artwork: ''Gardening Orc''
** By: Sue Wookey
* Letters
* News from [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* [[Mathoms|Mathom]]
** By: Anne Mathison
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* New Members
* Member Profile
** By: Clay Evans
* Dates for your Diary/Committee
